overview:
Paul Sutton is a managing director of Cross Atlantic. Paul oversees the operations of Cross Atlantic’s activities in Ireland. Paul is deeply involved in the growth and operations of numerous portfolio companies, including Metapack, Openet, and MobileAware.

Paul has more than 20 years experience in the IT industry, during which he has acted in a range of roles, predominantly in sales, marketing and business development. More recently, Paul established a technology fund and high tech incubation company for a private investor based in London City . Prior to that, Paul held executive positions in Cap Gemini, Hoskyns Insight, and the Olympic Group.
